DOC.brief_summary: All patient undergo carotid endarterectomy Shaare Zedek Medical Hospital , 1 year , offer participate . Retinal choroidal structural change assess use swept-source OCT technology
DOC.criteria: Carotid stenosis require surgical management Ocular condition : medium opacity preclude fundus visualization , bilateral nolight perception Ocular surgery within 6 month prior endarterectomy
